title: Poll: The economy is fueling political anger in 5 major countries
description: The international poll illustrates the uphill battle many leaders face in trying to contain the intertwined economic and political backlash.
content: The international poll illustrates the uphill battle many leaders face in trying to contain the intertwined economic and political backlash.
